title: Ginga Densetsu: Anju to Jiroumaru
original_name: 銀牙伝説 杏樹と次郎丸
sinopse: The story of Jiroumaru, an akita puppy who lives in a mountain hut with his siblings, mother, and two owners. When the puppies mother and owner die, the puppies take on the responsibility of looking after the little girl left behind, Anju.
